LanguageData.BirthQualityLifespanFix_PreventShortLife: When enabled, races with lifespans shorter than humans (80 years) will maintain at least a full 10-year equivalent peak quality window instead of having it shrunk proportionally.
LanguageData.BirthQualityLifespanFix_AgelessAtPeakBir: When enabled, pawns with the Ageless gene (or similar genes that completely stop aging) who have passed the peak quality window will always receive full birth quality bonus.
